front.title: Self-Describing Data Object Tags in YANG Data Models

abstract.t: This document defines a method to tag data objects that are associated with operation and management data in YANG modules. This method for tagging YANG data objects is meant to be used for classifying data objects from different YANG modules and identifying their characteristics data. Tags may be registered as well as assigned during the module definition, assigned by implementations, or dynamically defined and set by users. This document also provides guidance to future YANG data model writers; as such, this document updates RFC 8407.
